pasugiya dashaka thunaka kalaya pura emirets wisin sha‡∑äri lankawa lokaya samaga sambandha kirima wadath kapi penennaki. 1997 wasaredi boying 777 sewawa kolambaata aarambha kirima, jathika guwan sewaya samaga 1998 sita 2008 dakwa wasara 10 ka kalamanakarana giwisumak athikara ganima, 2012 wasaredi palamu saha wyaparika panthiye magin wenuwen bandaranayaka jathyanthara guwan thotupole giman halak aarambha kirima, 2014 wasaredi mahanuwara shakha karyalayak aarambha kirima mema dashaka thunaka kalaya thuladi emirets sha‡∑äri lankawa thula sidukala katayuthu we.
